title: Pixel 4 XL won't charge
content: I had accidentally let my Pixel 4 XL run out of battery power. When I charged it back up, it stopped charging at about 45%. Now it's sitting at about 10% power, and when I connect to the charger it will maintain the power level, but it won't charge further. In the battery settings, it reads "Plugged in, can't charge right now." I have tried turning it completely off and charging it shut down, but that didn't work either.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
